actionTemplate.title: Shift eyeshadow back to elongate the eye
steps: Set the lid with a light matte base
Focus the darkest shade on outer half of the eye
Pull the color slightly outward and upward for length
Blend toward the center so it fades smoothly
Keep the inner lid cleaner and brighter

rationaleTemplate: Back placement elongates round eyes and increases eye spacing
A clean inner lid keeps the look fresh and lifted
